title: Project Planning and Management
description: Define project scope, goals, and timeline. Assemble the project team and assign roles and responsibilities. Establish communication channels and project management processes.

title: Requirements Gathering and Analysis
description: Conduct market research and user studies to understand the target audience and their needs. Define functional and non-functional requirements for the bioluminescent body art system.

title: System Architecture Design for BioLuminousBodyArt Project - RFC Review and Update
description: Detailed design of the overall system architecture, covering: 1. Genetic Engineering Pipeline (updated to include more details on specific genetic modifications, cell line selection, and safety measures), 2. User Interface (UI) (added section for user customization features and accessibility considerations), 3. Control Mechanisms for Color and Pattern Changes (CMCPC) (clarified the method of control, either via smartphone app or wearable device), 4. Data Storage (DS) (emphasized secure and efficient data storage solutions with regular backups and disaster recovery plans), 5. Security Considerations (expanded on potential cybersecurity threats, data privacy concerns, and encryption methods for user data), Scalability/Performance Requirements (outlined scalability strategies for handling large volumes of data and ensuring system performance), Regulatory Compliance for Genetically Modified Organisms (GMOs) (updated to include specific regulatory bodies and compliance measures), 6. Addressing Ethical Implications and Considerations for Safe Use of the Technology (EISUT) (added section on potential ethical dilemmas, public perception, and steps to ensure safe use). This RFC includes a detailed explanation for each area.

title: Genetic Engineering Research and Development
description: Conduct research and develop techniques for genetically engineering bioluminescent cells and integrating them into human skin or other body tissues.

title: User Interface and Control System Development
description: Design and develop the user interface and control system for changing the color and pattern of the bioluminescent body art.

title: Database and Data Management
description: Design and implement a secure, scalable, and compliant database system to store user profiles, preferences, and bioluminescent patterns. This includes: data modeling, database design, data encryption, development of APIs, ensuring compliance with data privacy regulations (specifically GDPR, HIPAA, and CCPA), implementing proper access controls, data encryption, auditing mechanisms, and consideration for integrating machine learning algorithms for pattern recommendation and user experience enhancement. Collaborate with System Architecture Design, Security Requirements, Database Specialist teams to align database architecture with overall system design, security standards, and best practices. Upon completion of these subtasks, seek review from the assigned team members before merging to the main branch. To ensure a streamlined development process, it is suggested that tasks be broken down further into specific areas such as data modeling, database design, data encryption, and pattern recommendation algorithms. Once the dependencies are met (System Architecture Design and Security Requirements), update the rfc_state field to 'DRAFT_REVISED' and assign this task to the code-architect for implementation.

title: Security and Regulatory Compliance
description: Ensure the system complies with relevant regulations and privacy laws. Implement security measures to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access or modifications.

title: Testing and Quality Assurance
description: Develop a comprehensive testing strategy and plan. Conduct unit, integration, and end-to-end testing to ensure the system meets all requirements and functions as expected.
dependencies: User Interface and Control System Development

title: Deployment and Operations
description: Plan and implement the deployment strategy for the bioluminescent body art system. Set up the necessary infrastructure, monitoring, and support processes.

title: Documentation and User Training
description: Create comprehensive documentation for the system, including user guides, technical documentation, and training materials.
dependencies: User Interface and Control System Development
